title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please provide step 1 from the original report]
OB:
The default value is not set in the list box of the report parameter.
After modifying the default value, the OK button is still enabled.
EB:
Change the Display type to Combo Box.
Expected result:
- "aaa" should be the default value.
- After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
